thread.title: Century Aluminum seeks power deal or may close Mt Holly smelter
thread.title_full: Century Aluminum seeks power deal or may close Mt Holly smelter

title: Century Aluminum seeks power deal or may close Mt Holly smelter
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Oct 22, 2015, 21:45 BST - UK Markets closed Century Aluminum seeks power deal or may close Mt Holly smelter Reuters - UK Focus – 28 minutes ago UBGXF 0.00 
NEW YORK, Oct (HKSE: 3366-OL.HK - news ) 22 (Reuters) - Century Aluminum (NasdaqGS: CENX - news ) , majority owned by Glencore Plc (Xetra: A1JAGV - news ) , said on Thursday it will close its Mount Holly smelter in South Carolina at the end of the year if it doesn't get a new "competitively priced" power contract. 
Its current power deal with the South Carolina Public Service Authority, also known as Santee Cooper, will expire on Dec. 31 and the rates are the highest paid by any U.S (Other OTC: UBGXF - news ) . smelter, it said. (Reporting by Josephine Mason; Editing by Alan Crosby) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
